reviewText: First let me say the shipping and delivery were GREAT! the film arrived early which was fine with me.,  And while the film was pretty enjoyable overall it is showing its age a bit. But hardware wars is still funny even still, and it was definitely worth the price of admission.

atrio of fim farce(s): hardwardware wars,closet cse(s) of th nerd kind andporklips now! A"reel" trio of sideplitters!
AET

This video contains parodies of Star Wars, Close Encounters, Apocalypse Now. They were filmed on a low budget, with makeshift special effects. The films are all very creative, and funny. I received this as a Christmas gift in 1980, and I still have it 30 years later, and watch it occasionally. You can't miss with this one.
